Overview: Romantic island escape with beaches, temples, and luxury villas.
Hotel_Examples: The Anvaya Beach Resort, Amadea Resort Seminyak
Inclusions: 4★ stay with breakfast, private transfers, Ubud & Nusa Dua tours, candlelight dinner
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrive & relax | Day 2: Ubud Tour | Day 3: Watersports | Day 4: Leisure | Day 5: Dinner Cruise | Day 6: Depart
Ideal_Traveler_Persona: Couples aged 25–35 seeking a private romantic escape
SEO_Title: Romantic Bali Island Escape | Luxury 5-Night Honeymoon Package
SEO_Description: Celebrate love in Bali with a 5-night luxury getaway featuring 4-star beachfront resorts, private transfers, Ubud & Nusa Dua tours, and a sunset dinner cruise.
SEO_Keywords: Bali honeymoon package, romantic Bali holiday, Ubud tour, luxury resort Bali

Overview: A family-friendly holiday mixing nature, adventure, and relaxation.
Hotel_Examples: Hard Rock Hotel Bali, Bali Dynasty Resort
Inclusions: 6N stay with breakfast, airport transfers, full-day Ubud & Kintamani tour, water sports, Bali Zoo visit
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrive | Day 2: Ubud & Kintamani | Day 3: Water sports | Day 4: Bali Zoo | Day 5: Beach day | Day 6: Shopping | Day 7: Departure
Ideal_Traveler_Persona: Families with young kids seeking comfort & sightseeing
SEO_Title: Bali Family Adventure Holiday | 6-Night Nature & Culture Tour
SEO_Description: Explore Bali with the kids on a 6-night itinerary packed with Ubud & Kintamani excursions, beach fun in Kuta, water sports, and family-friendly 4-star hotels.
SEO_Keywords: Bali family package, Bali with kids, Ubud tour, family vacation Bali

Overview: A luxurious escape ideal for anniversaries with spa, sunsets, and private villas.
Hotel_Examples: The Royal Purnama, Hanging Gardens of Bali
Inclusions: 5★ villa stay, breakfast & dinner, spa treatment, private pool, transfers
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrival | Day 2: Spa & leisure | Day 3: Sunset at Tanah Lot | Day 4: Private dinner | Day 5: Depart
Ideal_Traveler_Persona: Couples celebrating anniversary in luxury settings
SEO_Title: Bali Anniversary Luxury Villa Retreat | 4-Night Spa Escape
SEO_Description: Indulge in a 5-day Bali anniversary retreat with private villas, daily spa rituals, candlelight dinners, and iconic Tanah Lot sunsets plus seamless chauffeured transfers.
SEO_Keywords: Bali anniversary trip, luxury villa Bali, romantic spa holiday, Ubud retreat

Overview: Economical yet full of experiences – perfect for young couples on a budget.
Hotel_Examples: The ONE Legian, Grand Zuri Kuta
Inclusions: Stay with breakfast, white water rafting, Mt. Batur trek, transfers
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrival | Day 2: Ubud Rafting | Day 3: Mt. Batur hike | Day 4: Explore Seminyak | Day 5: Departure
Ideal_Traveler_Persona: Budget couples seeking fun and adventure
SEO_Title: Budget Bali Adventure for Couples | 4-Night Thrill Getaway
SEO_Description: Chase waterfalls, conquer Mt. Batur, and party in Seminyak on a 4-night budget Bali escape with guided rafting, boutique stays, and convenient shared transfers.
SEO_Keywords: Bali adventure package, budget Bali trip, couple getaway, Mount Batur trek

Overview: Luxury family escape blending beach resorts, temples, and leisure.
Hotel_Examples: Sofitel Nusa Dua, Ayodya Resort Bali
Inclusions: Luxury 5★ stay, meals, private transfers, full-day sightseeing, water park visit
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrival | Day 2: City Tour | Day 3: Ubud | Day 4: Waterpark | Day 5: Beach Day | Day 6: Shopping | Day 7: Free | Day 8: Departure
Ideal_Traveler_Persona: Luxury-seeking families looking for relaxation and leisure
SEO_Title: Bali Luxury Family Resort Holiday | 8-Day Beach & Culture Escape
SEO_Description: Relax in Bali’s top 5-star resorts with half-board dining, private drivers, Ubud day trips, water parks, and curated family-friendly experiences for eight unforgettable days.
SEO_Keywords: luxury Bali family holiday, Nusa Dua resort package, Bali itinerary with kids, premium family trip

Overview: Surf, sun and nightlife — a Kuta & Canggu package focused on waves and parties.
Hotel_Examples: The Farm Hostel, Da Oma Canggu
Inclusions: 3★ stay, daily breakfast, 3 surf lessons, board rental, one guided nightlife crawl, transfers
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrive & beach chill | Day 2: Surf lessons | Day 3: Canggu cafes & beaches | Day 4: Day trip to Tanah Lot | Day 5: Beach party | Day 6: Depart
Ideal_Traveler_Persona: Young surfers and partygoers seeking budget surf coaching
SEO_Title: Bali Surf & Party | Canggu Surf Lessons and Kuta Nights
SEO_Description: Learn to surf in Canggu, enjoy Kuta nightlife and soak up Bali’s beach culture on this 6-day active and social package.
SEO_Keywords: Bali surf package, Canggu surf lessons, Kuta nightlife

Overview: Wellness and yoga retreat in serene Ubud — detox, daily yoga and spa therapies.
Inclusions: 5★ wellness resort stay, daily yoga & meditation, one spa treatment, guided nature walk, healthy meals, airport transfers
Exclusions: Flights, specialized therapies at extra cost
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrival & orientation | Day 2–6: Morning yoga, workshops, spa sessions, healthy meals | Day 7: Depart
Ideal_Traveler_Persona: Wellness seekers, yoga practitioners and those needing a digital detox
SEO_Title: Bali Wellness & Yoga Retreat | 7-Day Ubud Detox Program
SEO_Description: Rejuvenate in Ubud with daily yoga, spa treatments and nutritious meals at a top wellness resort on this immersive 7-day retreat.
SEO_Keywords: Bali wellness retreat, Ubud yoga retreat, Bali detox holiday

Overview: Cultural trails: temples, traditional villages, dance performances and craft workshops.
Hotel_Examples: Alaya Resort Ubud, Puri Gangga Resort
Inclusions: 4★ boutique stays, guided temple visits (Besakih, Tirta Empul), Balinese dance show, craft workshop, private transfers
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrive & orientation | Day 2: Ubud & craft workshop | Day 3: Tirta Empul & rice terraces | Day 4: Besakih temple & eastern Bali | Day 5: Tanah Lot sunset & dance | Day 6: Depart
Ideal_Traveler_Persona: Travelers interested in culture, traditions, and hands-on learning
SEO_Title: Bali Cultural Immersion | Temples, Dance & Craft Workshops
SEO_Description: Dive into Balinese culture with temple visits, traditional dance, craft classes and curated local experiences over a 6-day cultural itinerary.
SEO_Keywords: Bali cultural tour, Ubud craft workshop, Balinese dance experience

Overview: Scuba & marine life: discover vibrant coral reefs and PADI-certified diving.
Hotel_Examples: Blue Moon Villas, Amed Playa Resort, Tulamben dive spots
Inclusions: 4★ resort stay, 4 guided dives (PADI guides), equipment rental (basic), boat transfers to dive sites, snorkeling trip
Exclusions: PADI certification fees (if applicable), flights, insurance
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrive & briefing | Day 2–5: Morning & afternoon dives at Nusa Penida/Tulamben/Amed | Day 6: Snorkel trip & leisure | Day 7: Depart
SEO_Title: Bali Scuba Diving Package | Tulamben, Amed & Nusa Penida Dives
SEO_Description: Explore Bali’s underwater world with guided dives, equipment hire and stays close to best dive sites like Tulamben and Nusa Penida.
SEO_Keywords: Bali diving package, Tulamben diving, Nusa Penida dive trip

Overview: Photography & volcano trek package combining sunrise shoots and dramatic landscapes.
Hotel_Examples: Local mountain lodges, Ubud boutique stays
Inclusions: 3★ accommodation, guided Mt. Batur sunrise trek with photography guide, transport, editing workshop session, local cultural stop
Day_Wise_Itinerary: Day 1: Arrive Ubud | Day 2: Photography walk & workshop | Day 3: Mt. Batur sunrise trek & shoots | Day 4: Coastal shoot at Tanah Lot | Day 5: Free/market shoots | Day 6: Depart
Ideal_Traveler_Persona: Amateur & pro photographers wanting curated shoot locations and guidance
SEO_Title: Bali Photography & Mt. Batur Sunrise Trek | 6-Day Photo Adventure
SEO_Description: Capture Bali’s best light with guided photographic shoots, a Mt. Batur sunrise trek and local workshops on this 6-day creative adventure.
SEO_Keywords: Bali photography tour, Mt Batur sunrise trek, Ubud photo workshop
